abstract: Afghan government officials and Taliban representatives will meet for second round of peace talks in Pakistan, raising hopes two sides will soon end Afghanistan conflict.
lead_paragraph: Afghan government officials and Taliban representatives plan to meet in Pakistan on Friday, Pakistani officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: Afghanistan and Taliban to Hold Second Round of Talks, Pakistani Officials Say
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Pakistan: Afghan-Taliban Talks Set

snippet: Afghan government officials and Taliban representatives plan to meet in Pakistan on Friday, Pakistani officials said Tuesday.
